activate(double) - Method in class main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction
Applies the activation function to the input value.
ActivationConfig - Class in main.java.neat.config
Configuration class for neural network activation functions.

Builder class for creating and configuring ActivationConfig instances.

Creates a new ActivationConfigBuilder with an empty ActivationConfig.
ActivationFunction - Class in main.java.neat.functions
Abstract base class for neural network activation functions.
ActivationFunction(double) - Constructor for class main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction
Creates a new activation function with the specified threshold.
ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION - Enum in main.java.neat.functions
Enumeration of supported activation function types.
addActivationFunction(ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION) - Method in class main.java.neat.config.ActivationConfigBuilder
Adds an activation function to the list of allowed functions.
Agent - Class in main.java.neat.core
Represents an individual agent in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm.
aggregate(double[]) - Method in class main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction
Aggregates an array of input values into a single output value.
AggregationConfig - Class in main.java.neat.config
Configuration class for neural network aggregation functions.

Creates a new AggregationConfig with the specified allowed aggregation functions.
AggregationFunction - Class in main.java.neat.functions
An abstract class defining aggregation functions for neural network nodes.
AggregationFunction() - Constructor for class main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction
 
AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION - Enum in main.java.neat.functions
Enum representing different types of aggregation functions available for neural network nodes.
